Greta Thunberg, other climate activists block Swedish parliament entrancesGreta Thunberg and dozens of other environmental campaigners blocked the main entrances to Sweden's parliament on Monday in a sit-down protest against the effects of climate change and what they said was political inaction. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 13:08:03 GMT BNLLHNNGR5MYLJYBM5POBIBZBA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/greta-thunberg-other-climate-activists-block-swedish-parliament-entrances-2024-03-11/Ilze Filks可持续发展气候与能源
India moves to implement citizenship law opposed by Muslims, weeks before electionIndia announced rules on Monday to implement a 2019 citizenship law that critics call anti-Muslim, weeks before Prime Minister Narendra Modi seeks a rare third term for his Hindu nationalist government. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 12:47:02 GMT YHIS4DXEYNONVB7NPKY5SRY4XE https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-moves-implement-citizenship-law-opposed-by-muslims-weeks-before-election-2024-03-11/Reuters世界印度
American man jailed for life over rape and murder of tourist near German castleAn American man was sentenced to life in prison by a German court on Monday for the rape and murder of a tourist and the attempted murder of her friend, both from the U.S., in a brutal attack near the country's most famous tourist destination. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 12:38:23 GMT KKZTH5GHTZJBRP76FKQ4KG5HWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/american-man-jailed-life-over-rape-murder-tourist-near-german-castle-2024-03-11/Ayhan Uyanik, Louisa Off世界欧洲
Italian police arrest three Palestinians on terrorism chargesItalian police have arrested three Palestinians based in central Italy who they said were planning attacks in an unspecified country, a police statement said on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 12:27:20 GMT GVZCVEJMMFLORO2NZDWHC5T45E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italian-police-arrest- Three-palestinians-error-charges-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
India conducts first flight test of domestic missileIndia successfully conducted the first flight test of a domestically developed missile with Multiple Independently Targetable Re-entry Vehicle (MIRV) technology, India Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on messaging platform X on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 12:24:16 GMT 6KQTT2MJJBL23HRK53X4WVQP6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-conducts-first-flight-test-homegrown-missile-pm-modi-says-2024-03-11/Reuters世界印度
Russia, Iran and China to hold warship drills in Gulf of OmanRussia said a group of its warships had arrived in Iran to take part in drills with Iran and China in the Gulf of Oman and the Arabian Sea. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 12:20:33 GMT QRWH6MMYSVOXXOX6WBGCULW2Z4 https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-iran-china-hold-warship-drills-gulf-oman-2024-03-11/Reuters世界
Blinken to travel to Jamaica for CARICOM meeting on Haiti, US State Dept saysU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will travel to Jamaica on Monday to attend a Caribbean Community (CARICOM) meeting on Haiti where a collapse in security and a humanitarian crisis in the Caribbean nation has unfolded, the State Department said. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 12:18:33 GMT OZ4SBW5HUBNNNEAEN43J6BP4ME https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/blinken-travel-jamaica-caricom-meeting-haiti-us-state-dept-says-2024-03-11/Reuters世界美洲
Putin pledges over $126 billion in public spending as election loomsPresident Vladimir Putin is set to extend his 24 years as Russia's paramount ruler in an election on March 15-17 and has promised more than 11.5 trillion roubles ($126.5 billion) in infrastructure and social spending over the next six years. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 11:56:03 GMT HGQQJM3Y5RO5PEGEH2T53GR76Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-pledges-over-126-billion-public-spending-election-looms-2024-03-11/Darya Korsunskaya世界欧洲
Floods, landslides kill 26 in Indonesia, at least six missingFlooding and landslides in the Indonesian province of West Sumatra have killed 26 people and at least six are missing, authorities said on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 11:49:08 GMT YNYXTLU3JJLE7KEH3X7SNZSHL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/floods-landslides-kill-26-indonesia-least-six-missing-2024-03-11/Tri Iswanto商业环境
Austrian court blocks incestuous rapist Fritzl's move to regular prisonAn Austrian court said on Monday it had overturned a lower court's ruling that 88-year-old incestuous rapist Josef Fritzl be transferred to regular prison from a prison psychiatric unit, but sent the case back to that court for a new decision. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 11:46:25 GMT N4EACO7J6ZP2FGDOWRPNFNTWXI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/austrian-court-orders-rapist-fritzl-must-stay-put-prison-apa-says-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel checking reports that Hamas' military No 2 killed in Gaza strikeIsrael was checking on Monday if Hamas's second-highest military leader died in an air strike, media said, as talks stumbled to secure a ceasefire in the Gaza war to coincide with the Muslim holy month of Ramadan. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 11:25:38 GMT O4PVRGHXZFLITKVN7J77U3EYQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-checking-reports-that-hamas-military-no-2-killed-gaza-strike-2024-03-11/Maayan Lubell, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
